entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
